title: Ingame chat filter cannot be disabled
body: With the new client on a fresh install, the "Enable Chat Filter" setting does not carry over into the game. Having it disabled in the client won't disable it in the game.

replies.body: To the best of my knowledge there is a separate chat filter for client and in game, so you'll have to change the chat filter setting when you're actually in game. If you can't find it I'll take another look for you.
I can't find it ingame. I've looked through the config file as well.

Curious, pretty sure it used to be under Interface > Chat but I can't see it either. Could be to do with the new client eventually letting us change in game options form the client, but not sure yet. I'll see if I can find out more info for you.
